name: local-falcon-mcp
description: Monitor and improve visibility across AI search platforms (ChatGPT, Gemini, Grok, Google AI Overviews, AI Mode) and in local search (Google Maps, Apple Maps) with 37 tools for AI visibility tracking, geo-grid rank analysis, competitor intelligence, campaign management, and Google Business Profile monitoring.
long_description:
An MCP server for the Local Falcon AI Visibility and local SEO platform. Connect Claude to your Local Falcon account to track how businesses appear across AI search results and traditional map platforms.

Capabilities include running geo-grid scans that check visibility from dozens of surrounding coordinates simultaneously, retrieving scan reports with AI-powered analysis, tracking visibility trends over time, managing scheduled campaigns across multiple locations and keywords, monitoring Google Business Profiles for unwanted changes with Falcon Guard, analyzing reviews with sentiment and topic breakdowns, and researching competitors to identify strategic opportunities.

Supported platforms: Google Maps, Apple Maps, Google AI Overviews, Google AI Mode, ChatGPT, Gemini, and Grok.

api_key.title: Local Falcon API Key
api_key.description: Your Local Falcon API key. Find it at localfalcon.com/api/credentials under Developers > API & MCP Credentials.

tools.name: listLocalFalconScanReports
tools.description: Lists existing scan reports with metadata including date, keyword, location, ARP, ATRP, SoLV, grid size, and platform.

tools.name: getLocalFalconReport
tools.description: Retrieves a specific scan report by report_key with full ranking data including ARP, ATRP, SoLV, competitor summary, grid visualization images, and AI analysis.

tools.name: listAllLocalFalconLocations
tools.description: Lists all business locations already configured in the Local Falcon account.

tools.name: getLocalFalconGoogleBusinessLocations
tools.description: Searches Google for business listings to find Place IDs needed for running scans.

tools.name: runLocalFalconScan
tools.description: Runs a new geo-grid ranking scan for a business. Costs credits. Supports Google Maps, Apple Maps, and AI platforms.

tools.name: listLocalFalconCampaignReports
tools.description: Lists campaign reports for scheduled, recurring scans across multiple locations and/or keywords.

tools.name: getLocalFalconCampaignReport
tools.description: Retrieves a specific campaign report with aggregated ARP, ATRP, SoLV metrics, individual scan results, and scheduling info.

tools.name: createLocalFalconCampaign
tools.description: Creates a new campaign with scheduled recurring scans for one or multiple locations with one or multiple keywords.

tools.name: runLocalFalconCampaign
tools.description: Manually triggers a campaign to run immediately. Costs credits.

tools.name: pauseLocalFalconCampaign
tools.description: Pauses a campaign to stop it from running on its scheduled frequency.

tools.name: resumeLocalFalconCampaign
tools.description: Resumes a campaign from a deactivated or paused status.

tools.name: reactivateLocalFalconCampaign
tools.description: Reactivates a campaign that was deactivated due to insufficient credits.

tools.name: listLocalFalconReviewsAnalysisReports
tools.description: Lists Reviews Analysis reports with AI-powered review insights for target businesses and competitors.

tools.name: getLocalFalconReviewsAnalysisReport
tools.description: Retrieves a specific Reviews Analysis report with RVS, RQS, review velocity, freshness, sentiment, and topic analysis.

tools.name: listLocalFalconGuardReports
tools.description: Lists locations monitored by Falcon Guard for Google Business Profile changes.

tools.name: getLocalFalconGuardReport
tools.description: Retrieves a Falcon Guard report showing GBP monitoring data, metrics, and historical changes for a location.

tools.name: addLocationsToFalconGuard
tools.description: Adds one or multiple locations to be protected by Falcon Guard monitoring.

tools.name: pauseFalconGuardProtection
tools.description: Pauses Falcon Guard protection for one or multiple locations.

tools.name: resumeFalconGuardProtection
tools.description: Resumes Falcon Guard protection for previously paused locations.

tools.name: removeFalconGuardProtection
tools.description: Removes locations from Falcon Guard monitoring entirely.

tools.name: listLocalFalconTrendReports
tools.description: Lists trend reports showing ranking changes over time for location + keyword combinations.

tools.name: getLocalFalconTrendReport
tools.description: Retrieves a specific trend report showing historical ARP, ATRP, and SoLV changes across multiple scan dates.

tools.name: listLocalFalconAutoScans
tools.description: Lists individually scheduled automatic scans (not campaign-based).

tools.name: listLocalFalconLocationReports
tools.description: Lists location reports aggregating scan data across multiple keywords for a specific business location.

tools.name: getLocalFalconLocationReport
tools.description: Retrieves a specific location report showing keyword performance for one business location.

tools.name: listLocalFalconKeywordReports
tools.description: Lists keyword reports aggregating scan data across multiple locations for a specific keyword.

tools.name: getLocalFalconKeywordReport
tools.description: Retrieves a specific keyword report showing location performance for one keyword.

tools.name: getLocalFalconCompetitorReports
tools.description: Lists competitor analysis reports showing top-ranking businesses in scanned areas.

tools.name: getLocalFalconCompetitorReport
tools.description: Retrieves a specific competitor report with competitive landscape data including ARP, ATRP, SoLV, reviews, and ratings.

tools.name: getLocalFalconGrid
tools.description: Generates grid coordinates for use with single-point ranking checks.

tools.name: getLocalFalconRankingAtCoordinate
tools.description: Checks ranking at exactly one coordinate. For comprehensive analysis, use runLocalFalconScan instead.

tools.name: getLocalFalconKeywordAtCoordinate
tools.description: Shows raw search results at one single point. For ranking analysis, use runLocalFalconScan instead.

tools.name: searchForLocalFalconBusinessLocation
tools.description: Searches for business locations on Google or Apple Maps platforms.

tools.name: saveLocalFalconBusinessLocationToAccount
tools.description: Saves a business location to your Local Falcon account. Required before running scans.

tools.name: viewLocalFalconAccountInformation
tools.description: Retrieves Local Falcon account information including user, credits, and subscription details.

tools.name: searchLocalFalconKnowledgeBase
tools.description: Searches the Local Falcon Knowledge Base for help articles, how-to guides, and platform documentation.

tools.name: getLocalFalconKnowledgeBaseArticle
tools.description: Retrieves the full content of a specific Knowledge Base article by ID.
